titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate to conduct a blood donation drive.
A resolution authorizing the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate to conduct a blood donation drive.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate, in conjunction with the American Red Cross, to conduct a blood donation drive on October 14, 2022, in room G-50 of the Everett McKinley Dirksen Senate Office Building.
